name: Garry 6 VS Jerry 2: Garrrevengeance 2 Garry
description:
Garry the Wizard returns in this epic cniematic collaboration. Face a well established foe and shoot people and stuff!

-Epic story

-cutscenes

The most anticipated cross over of the generation is here! Jerry is stuck in a cycle of revenge and out to get Garry. Two giants clash in this epic. - All your favourite characters across the series appear for this event. - 5 whole animated 3D cutscenes - 3 Levels with their own unique soundtrack - Action combat never seen before in a video game

-audio

-Gameplay

-less ads

Created by Mouse123 and AJSH or Big Oof
